data.name: ErrMsg_IPDenied
data.value: Service to this IP has been suspended
data.comment: 系統暫時停止對目前所在位址的服務

data.name: ErrMsg_GetDataException
data.comment: 取得資料時發生異常錯誤

data.name: CaptchaPic_Hint
data.value: Please click here if Verification Code is not clear.
data.comment: 如驗證圖無法辨識，請點擊這裡重新產生

data.name: Main_btnPreview_Hint
data.comment: 預覽未開放的網頁內容

data.name: Main_btnPreviewZhTw_Hint
data.comment: 預覽未開放的網頁內容(正體中文版)

data.name: Main_btnPreviewEn_Hint
data.comment: 預覽未開放的網頁內容(English)

data.name: Dashboard_Greeting
data.comment: 您已成功登入後端管理系統！

data.name: Pager_txtPageCode_Hint
data.value: Enter the page number and press Enter to send out
data.comment: 輸入頁碼後可按 Enter 送出

data.name: ErrMsg_InvalidPageCode
data.comment: 請輸入 1 以上的數字

data.name: PswRuleNotice_LooseRule
data.value: must be more than 6 digits long. Please use English letters, Arabic numerals or other special symbols (such as !@#...)
data.comment: 限6個字元以上的英文字母、阿拉伯數字與特殊符號(!@#...)

data.name: PswRuleNotice_StrictRule
data.value: must be more than 12 characters, containing at least special symbols, uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers
data.comment: 12~15個字元，內容至少包含特殊符號、英文字母大寫及小寫、數字

data.name: ErrMsg_PswNotQualified
data.value: Content does not match the rules

data.name: Account_PswComment
data.value: If you wish to keep the present password, please leave this section in blank

data.name: ErrMsg_PswConfirmNotMatch
data.comment: 請輸入相同的文字內容

data.name: ConfigForm_Notice_Copy
data.value: Press Ctrl + C to copy the text
data.comment: 請按 Ctrl + C 複製文字

data.name: ConfigForm_Notice_BeforeOpenToNewWindow
data.value: Notice! The system will reload the contents of this page,\nIf you continue the operation will lose the information in the editing, continue?
data.comment: 注意!系統將重新載入本頁內容，\n若繼續此動作會遺失編輯中的資料，是否繼續?

data.name: ErrMsg_ThereIsAccountOfRole
data.value: there is account of role, not allowed to delete.
data.comment: 身分已有帳號使用，不允許刪除

data.name: ErrMsg_RoleNameLimit
data.value: Only letters and numbers and underline are allowed

data.name: Role_RoleNameComment
data.value: Only letters and numbers and underline are allowed

data.name: GroupLabel_OperationPrivilegeConfig
data.value: Adjust privileges of the selected operation
data.comment: 調整選擇的作業選項權限

data.name: ErrMsg_ThereIsnotAnyChangesOfPvg
data.value: There is not any changes of privilege.

data.name: ErrMsg_ThereIsAccountOfDept
data.value: there is account of department, not allowed to delete.
data.comment: 部門已有帳號使用，不允許刪除

data.name: ErrMsg_ThereIsSubitemofOp
data.value: there is sub-item of operation, not allowed to delete.
data.comment: 此作業選項有子項目，不允許刪除

data.name: Operation_btnBrowseImage_Notice
data.value: Please put the graphic files in the website directory [BPimages/icon]
data.comment: 請將圖示檔案放至網站目錄[ BPimages/icon ]中

data.name: Operation_txtLinkUrl_Notice
data.value:
．{website_url} = Will be replaced by the front-stage URL. e.g., http://SampleCMS.dev.com
．{backend_url} = Will be replaced by the back-stage URL. e.g., https://SampleCMS.dev.com/Management
data.comment:
．{website_url} = 帶入前台完整網址. e.g., http://SampleCMS.dev.com
．{backend_url} = 帶入後台完整網址. e.g., https://SampleCMS.dev.com/Management

data.name: Operation_btnBrowseClass_Notice
data.value:
．Case sensitive!
．This setting is a data source of system used to determine the authority, if not sure, do not change!
．「Site Architecture Mgmt.」set to「ArticleCommonOfBackend」!
data.comment:
．有區分大小寫！
．此設定為系統用來判斷權限的資料來源，若不確定時請勿更改！
．「網站架構管理」請設定為「ArticleCommonOfBackend」！

data.name: Operation_btnBrowseClass_Notice2
data.value: ．When the URL is Article-Node.aspx, please set it as blank!
data.comment: ．超連結網址為 Article-Node.aspx 時，請設定為空白！

data.name: Article_txtBannerPicFileName_Notice
data.value: Please put the picture file in the website directory [(language number)]
data.comment: 請將圖檔放至網站目錄[ (語言編號) ]中

data.name: Article_txtLinkUrl_Notice
data.value: Fill in the link URL, custom web program please use ~ / beginning. e.g., ~/News.aspx
data.comment: 填入連結網址，客製化網頁程式請用 ~/ 開頭， e.g., ~/News.aspx

data.name: Article_chkIsHideSelf_Notice
data.value: If there is a menu, this article does not appear in the parent's menu
data.comment: 若有選單，在父層的選單中不出現本篇文章

data.name: Article_chkIsHideChild_Notice
data.value: If there is a menu, all the sub-items will not be listed in the menu
data.comment: 若有選單，在選單中不列出所有子項目

data.name: ErrMsg_AddMultiLangFailed
data.comment: 新增多國語系資料失敗

data.name: ErrMsg_UpdateMultiLangFailed
data.comment: 更新多國語系資料失敗

data.name: Attachment_fuPickedFile_Notice
data.value: When uploading graphic file, if the file resolution exceeds 1920x1080, the system will automatically reduce and save the file to 1920x1080 or less
data.comment: 上傳圖檔時，若圖檔解析度超過1920x1080，則系統將自動縮小並儲存圖檔至1920x1080以內

data.name: Attachment_Title_AddNew_Format
data.value: Add an attachment of article - article id:{0}
data.comment: 新增網頁附件 - 網頁id:{0}

data.name: Attachment_Title_Edit_Format
data.value: Edit attachment of article - file id:{0}
data.comment: 修改網頁附件 - 附件id:{0}

data.name: Main_btnClickToOpenInNewWin_Hint
data.value: Click to open in new window

data.name: ArticlePicture_Title_AddNew_Format
data.value: Add a picture of article - article id:{0}
data.comment: 新增網頁照片 - 網頁id:{0}

data.name: ArticlePicture_Title_Edit_Format
data.value: Edit picture of article - picture id:{0}
data.comment: 修改網頁照片 - 照片id:{0}

data.name: ArticleVideo_btnGetYoutubeId
data.value: Extract id from Youtube video URL
data.comment: 抓出 Youtube 影片代碼

data.name: ArticleVideo_btnGetYoutubeId_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to replace the current Youtube video id?
data.comment: 確定要替換目前的 Youtube 影片代碼?

data.name: ArticleVideo_Title_AddNew_Format
data.value: Add a Youtube video - article id:{0}
data.comment: 新增 Youtube 影片 - 網頁id:{0}

data.name: ArticleVideo_Title_Edit_Format
data.comment: 修改 Youtube 影片 - 影片id:{0}

data.name: Article_chkSubjectAtBannerArea
data.value: Make the subject position in the banner area

data.name: Article_chkSubjectAtBannerArea_Notice
data.value: Otherwise the position in the content area

data.name: Article_chkUpdateSearchDataSource
data.value: Search sources are updated immediately after saving
data.comment: 儲存時立即更新搜尋用資料來源

data.name: Pick_ConfirmSelect_Format
data.value: Are you sure you want to select [{0}]?

data.name: ErrMsg_ChangePasswordException
data.value: An exception error occurred while updating the password
data.comment: 更新密碼時發生異常錯誤

data.name: ErrMsg_NoMatchedAccount
data.value: Check that there is no account and email information
data.comment: 查無指定帳號與 Email 資訊

data.name: ErrMsg_PrepareEmailException
data.value: An exception error occurred while preparing Email
data.comment: 準備信件內容時發生異常錯誤

data.name: PswRequire_Success
data.comment: 重置密碼通知信已送出

data.name: ErrMsg_PswRequireSendFailed
data.comment: 要求重置密碼通知信寄送失敗
